error_description: Replacing .orElseThrow() with .get() in AddressServiceImpl.getById() causes an unhandled NoSuchElementException and returns HTTP 500 instead of the proper HTTP 404 whenever a client requests a non-existent address ID

Removing @PreAuthorize(admin) from the user deletion endpoint allows any authenticated user to permanently delete any account, including all administrators, leading to immediate and irreversible loss of system ownership
